content.question: Based on the excerpt, the westward migration by the Mormons in the 1830s and 1840s was most likely motivated by the

choices.label: interest in establishing law and order in the newly acquired territories
desire to religiously convert American Indians
declining threat of hardship on the overland trails
need to take refuge from persecution

content.answer: need to take refuge from persecution
